<reasoning>I need to carefully extract information from this job posting for an AI Data Engineer position at Mattoni 1873 in Prague, Czechia. Let me go through each section systematically.

First, let me identify what information is explicitly stated:

**Title and Company:**
- Title: AI Data Engineer
- Company: Mattoni 1873
- Location: Prague, Prague, Czechia

**Compensation:**
- No salary information is mentioned in the posting
- No hourly rates mentioned
- No compensation details at all

**Work Authorization:**
- No explicit mention of visa sponsorship
- No mention of work authorization requirements
- No citizenship requirements mentioned
- No security clearance mentioned

**Work Model:**
- "hybrid way of work" is mentioned in the benefits section
- No specific employment type mentioned (full-time, contract, etc.)

**Contract Details:**
- No contract type mentioned
- No contract duration mentioned
- No start date mentioned
- No probation period mentioned

**Contractor Rates:**
- No contractor rates mentioned

**Skills Classification:**
Let me analyze the skills mentioned:

From "What We're Looking For":
- Education: Degree in Informatics (Data Analytics, AI/ML or related field)
- Experience: 1+ years of business hands-on experience with AI models (LLMs, Computer Vision models)
- Skills: Python, SQL, Azure services (e.g., Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric), Azure DevOps
- Languages: Czech/Slovak (fluent level), English (advanced)

From "What You'll Be Doing":
- Prepare and transform data for AI/ML model training
- Deploy and monitor AI models on Microsoft Azure
- Automate workflows and integrate APIs (Python)
- Collaborate with senior AI developer and business stakeholders
- Ensure data governance, privacy, and ethical AI practices

From "We'll Be a Good Team Match If You":
- approach challenges with an analytical mindset, using data and logic to guide decisions


- take initiative, actively seeking opportunities to improve processes and deliver value
- eager to learn, continuously developing your skills and staying curious about new technologies

I'll focus on the soft skills and technical requirements. The role demands proactive problem-solving, continuous learning, and a strong technical foundation in AI and data engineering. Key soft skills include initiative, analytical thinking, and a commitment to ongoing skill development. The position requires hands-on experience with AI models, particularly LLMs and computer vision, along with proficiency in Python, SQL, and Azure services.

The role emphasizes collaborative work with senior developers and business stakeholders, highlighting the importance of communication and teamwork. Data governance and ethical AI practices are critical components of the job responsibilities.

The company offers a comprehensive benefits package, including flexible working arrangements, professional development opportunities, and additional perks like meal allowances and fitness programs. The location in Prague provides a strategic advantage for professionals seeking to work in a dynamic European tech environment.

The AI Competence Center represents an innovative approach to integrating artificial intelligence into business processes, offering employees the chance to contribute to cutting-edge technological solutions.

The role requires a unique blend of technical expertise and soft skills, with a focus on continuous learning and collaborative problem-solving. Professionals will need to demonstrate proficiency in data transformation, AI model deployment, and cross-functional teamwork.

Key qualifications include hands-on experience with AI models, strong programming skills in Python and SQL, and the ability to work effectively with Azure-based technologies. The position emphasizes not just technical competence, but also a proactive approach to improving processes and delivering meaningful business value.

The ideal candidate will be fluent in Czech/Slovak and have advanced English language skills, enabling seamless communication across diverse teams and stakeholders. This role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the company's first AI/ML projects from initial conception through full deployment.
</reasoning>
